title: Fiddle-leaf Figs, Snake Plants, and Parlor Palms Are on Sale Today Only
text:
9 items in this article 9 items on sale! Photo: Courtesy of the Retailers

At this point, it’s somewhat old news that you can buy a plant on Amazon. But the fact that there’s a veritable nursery of live plants available for purchase on the internet, with no extra fee for two-day shipping (if you’re a Prime member), is still pretty incredible — especially when those plants are on sale. So whether you’re in the market for a hardy snake plant or want to finally decorate your living room with a fiddle-leaf fig, here are a bunch of Strategist-approved plants that are up to 33 percent off right now on Amazon.

Costa Farms Aloe Vera Live Indoor House Plant, 10-Inch, White-Natural Planter $17 (was $21, now 19% off) An aloe vera plant for the person who never reapplies sunscreen. $17 at Amazon Buy

Costa Farms 3-Pack Assortment Euphorbia Cactus, 7 to 10-Inches Tall, Ships in Grower Pot $20 (was $27, now 26% off) A trio of cacti would thrive on a sunny windowsill (but just be sure to care for it properly). $20 at Amazon Buy

Costa Farms Live Bromeliad Indoor Tabletop Plant in 6-Inch Grower's Pot $17 (was $22, now 23% off) When there was practically an entire Amazon nursery on sale a few months ago, this colorful bromeliad was also discounted. It’s the perfect plant to buy with winter on the horizon because it grows well in indoor light. $17 at Amazon Buy

Costa Farms Fiddle-Leaf Fig Tree in Grower's Pot, 4-Feet Tall $59 (was $79, now 25% off) According to Strategist writer, and resident plant expert, David Notis, the fiddle-leaf fig is the original status plant. Get it for your living room, or gift it to a friend who is really only doing it for the ‘gram. $59 at Amazon Buy

Costa Farms Neanthe Bella Parlor Palm, 14 to 16-Inches Tall, in White-Natural Lightweight Décor Planter $24 (was $32, now 25% off) In general palms can be iffy to keep in a home with pets, but several experts deemed this Central American palm to be a safe choice — especially because it comes in a tall, heavy pot that will prevent digging. $24 at Amazon Buy

Costa Farms Burgundy Rubber Ficus elastica, 2 to 3-Feet Tall, with Décor Planter $35 (was $50, now 30% off) For another potential status plant there’s this hardy rubber ficus. $35 at Amazon Buy

Costa Farms Snake Plant with 6.5-Inch Wide Mid-Century Modern Planter $27 (was $40, now 33% off) Rebecca Bullene, founder of Greenery NYC, deemed this plant to be “pretty much indestructible,” so it’s a great gift for beginning plant parents (or actual parents who wish they had a green thumb). $27 at Amazon Buy

Costa Farms Majesty Palm Tree, Live Indoor Plant, 3 to 4-Feet Tall with Décor Planter $37 (was $49, now 24% off) This cheap but expensive-looking palm will add some tropical flourish to your patio or fire escape. $37 at Amazon Buy

Costa Farms Sansevieria Cylindrica Succulent-Like Live Indoor Plant, 6-Inches Tall $18 (was $24, now 25% off) Another type of hardy snake plant, ideal for those who don’t have access to a lot of light or have notoriously bad luck with keeping plants alive. $18 at Amazon Buy
